muchatter_l10n_strings.profile_edit_areas:
To fill in or change your information, click one of the buttons below.

Please note that some fields are pre-populated based on your Telegram account's public data and may be subject to change depending on your privacy settings.
muchatter_l10n_strings.profile_edit_areas_2: Enter your details in the selected %s field. When you're finished, submit directly there.
muchatter_l10n_strings.settings_edit_areas: To change the desired parameter, click one of the buttons below.
muchatter_l10n_strings.settings_edit_areas_2: Enter a new value for the %s parameter. When you're done, submit it directly there.
